title: Collectiones peregrinatiorum in Indiam orientalem et Indiam occidentalem
note: These volumes are divided into two series. The West Indies series (also called India occidentalis and Great Voyages, dealing with the exploration and colonisation of the Americas, numbers thirteen volumes [1-13] with two supplements [9+, 11+]. The East Indies series (also called India orientalis or Lesser Voyages), whose texts treat primarily Africa and Asia, spans twelve volumes [1-12] with two supplements [1+, 9+].
